Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the protection of victims of domestic violence act
Summary: Relates to the protection of victims of domestic violence act, which requires defendants to wear global positioning systems monitoring the location of the defendant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the "protection of victims of domestic violence act"
